Reviews.Title: Excellent phone!!! /// Muy buen Equipo!!

Reviews.Content: (19/10/2012) Excellent phone! works very fast ..... complatible with several applications .... the keyboard is very help (although it comes in English), the only problem is that the battery does not last long; recommend buying a higher capacity battery (but would increase its weight)Excelente celular!! funciona muy rapido..... complatible con varias aplicaciones.... el teclado es de suma ayuda (aunque viene en ingles); el unico problema es que la bateria no dura mucho; recomiendo comprar una bateria de mayor capacidad (aunque aumentaria su peso)(08/06/2013) Small or big drawback with the phone ...... flex cable .... breaks or abusive about a year or less ... which causes the screen goes dark .... this is caused by using the keyboard or slider.Pequeño o gran inconveniente con el celular...... el cable flex.... se rompe o se maltrata alrededor de un año o menos tiempo... lo cual provoca que la pantalla se ponga oscura.... esto se ocasiona al usar el teclado o slider.

Reviews.Title: Droid 3
Reviews.Author: Mcphee
Reviews.Content: Just got the phone today and so far so good. No lag very responsive .. Only thing is this was false advertised I did not get a 16gb micro sd card instead it only came with a 2gb.. Sadly I'm very disappointed about that.. But otherwise it is a great phone :)

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: D Hobbyist
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone especially for the used price. the phone with one of the best keyboards ever made for a smart phone because of the tactile feedback.Compared to recent smart phones this phone is slow at times.It's a truly beautiful phone and it has a very good screen. It's battery lasts very long it has a very good power saving mode unless you're really using it hard. For regular use however like making a few calls and only at certain parts of the day you're using heavy data and wireless browsing or other such activities this phone is great.Note that the statement in the description (unlocked for International Only) does not mean that they phone is unlocked for international use but means that the phone can be unlocked and used as a global phone. Or at least my phone did not come unlocked I had to pay for a unlock code to get it unlocked.The main negative about this phone is that it does not have android 4.0 which I'm amazed at as it's a Motorola device. You can root the phone and install a custom ROM that probably would allow you to use android 4.0 but straight from the company you won't be able to. If you want a phone that is similar to this one (physical keyboard) especially in terms of price then you can check out the Captivate Glide because it has android 4.04 but it's keyboard is not close to this phone.

Reviews.Title: Quick review
Reviews.Author: RCBuyer
Reviews.Content: Gift for my wife. Very good product from Motorola. I don't like the keyboard very much as I don't use it, but my wife love it. I rather on-screen keyboard. The speed of the hone is very nice, reception is unbelievable. The speaker is loud and clear when playing media or when phone rings/provide an alert. 3G speed is fine.I can't give a 5 star to this product, due to some aspects that are not quite right. The phone has that horrible Verizon logo -really, why the carriers love to brand technology, it's stupid. It is exactly when car dealers insist in put their ugly sticker to a fine piece of engineering. So, on top of being a walking ad, the OS is stuffed with useless Verizon apps that are hard to uninstall.I had to configure the phone caller ID, location where I'm using it, but due to Verizon stupidity and big ego, I couldn't change the default dial number for voice mail, and contact my carrier (*611 keeps dialing Verizon's customer service international number) If you know how to do this, please comment...Overall, if you don't mind branding, it's a good phone.
